name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Trump administration is about to unveil its Middle East peace plan. It involves giving everyone guns.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: In an interview, Education Secretary Betsy DeVos says she’s not unqualified for the job, just "misunderstood." The actual word she used was "misunderstoodinated."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Fox News is about to debut its new tagline. Instead of "fair and balanced," they're going with “thanks for watching, Mr. President.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Beyoncé announced that she is going on tour this summer with Jay-Z. It’s the "I'm Keeping an Eye on Him" tour.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: On Friday, Marvel announced that there will be a Black Panther sequel. Marvel's CEO said, "It was a difficult decision but ultimately we decided to make another billion dollars."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Costco is selling a Doomsday food kit that can feed a typical family for a year. Walmart sells the same kit, but it only feeds a typical Walmart family for six days.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A nightclub in Miami has lost its business license after a woman brought a horse onto the dance floor. In the nightclub's defense, the horse's ID looked real.
